phoneError.ghanaInvalid: Yɛsrɛ wo, hyɛ Ghana foon nɔma a ɛwɔ nɔma 9 a ɛteɛ mu (mf. 241234567).
phoneError.ukInvalid: Yɛsrɛ wo, hyɛ UK foon nɔma a ɛwɔ nɔma 10 na ɛhyɛ aseɛ ne 7 mu.

otp.title: Hwɛ wo Nɔma mu
otp.subtitle: Hyɛ nɔma 6 a yɛde amena wo wɔ {{phoneNumber}} so no mu
otp.label: OTP
otp.error: Nɔma no nyɛ. Yɛsrɛ wo, san bɔ mmɔden bio.

register.title: Wie wo Prahyia so Nsɛm
register.subtitle: Nsɛm kakra bi a ɛhia na yɛatumi ayɛ wo kama.

food.title: Aduane & Adidibea
food.desc: Ma yɛmfa w'aduane a wopɛ no mmra wo ntɛm.

grocery.title: Nnuaba & Tɔɔnso
grocery.desc: Nnuaba foforɔ firi wo tɔɔnso a ɛbɛn wo.

pharmacy.title: Aduro & Ayaresabea Nnoɔma
pharmacy.desc: Aduro ne apɔmuden nnoɔma a ɛbɛba w'anim.

package.title: Nkrante & Pooso
package.desc: Mena na gye nkrante mmerɛ sononko so.

document.title: Krataa
document.desc: Nkrataa a ɛho hia a yɛde bɛbrɛ wo dwoodwoo.

heavy.title: Nnoɔma a ɛmu yɛ duru
heavy.desc: Sɛ te sɛ nkonnwa ne nnoɔma akɛseɛ foforɔ.

moving.title: Ofie Tutu
moving.desc: Tu wo fie anaa ɔfese mmerɛ sononko so.

business.title: Adwumayɛ ho Nsɛm
business.desc: Adwumayɛ ho nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛyɛ papa ma wo dwumadie.

location.title: Hyehyɛ wo Kwan
location.subtitle: Ɛhe na yɛnfa na ɛhe na yɛnkɔgye?
location.validationError: Yɛsrɛ wo, yi adrɛse a ɛteɛ firi nea ɛwɔ hɔ no mu.

packageDetails.title: Nkrante ho Nsɛm
packageDetails.subtitle: Ka biribi fa wo nnoɔma no ho.
packageDetails.descriptionPlaceholder: mf. Kɔmputa, Nkrataa a ɛho hia, akyɛdeɛ adaka

confirmation.title: Hwɛ wo Nsɛm a Wɔde Ama mu
confirmation.summaryTitle: Nsɛm a Wɔde Ama no Tiatia

tier.title: Yi ɔkwan a yɛmfa so mfa mma wo

express.title: Ntɛmntɛm
express.desc: Yɛn kwan a ɛyɛ hare paa, ɛkɔ tẽẽ.

sameDay.title: Nnɛ da yi ara
sameDay.desc: Yɛde bɛbrɛ wo nnɔnhwere mu, ɛboɔ yɛ fɛ.

scheduled.title: Da a wɔahyɛ
scheduled.desc: Yi bere pɔtee bi a yɛmfa mma wo.

economy.title: Sika ketewaa bi
economy.desc: Ne boɔ nyɛ den, yɛde bɛbrɛ wo nnɔnhwere 24 mu.

notification.title: Nsɛm foforɔ: {{status}}
notification.body: Yɛasesa wo nsɛm a ɛfa wo nnoɔma ho wɔ {{time}}.

rating.title: Wo nnoɔma a yɛde brɛɛ wo no te sɛn?
rating.subtitle: Wo mmuaeɛ bɛboa ma yɛayɛ yie.
rating.reviewPlaceholder: Ka yɛn ho asɛm pii fa wo suahunu ho (ɛnyɛ ahyɛdeɛ)

orderUpdates.title: Order Foforɔ
orderUpdates.desc: Gye nsɛm foforɔ fa wo nnoɔma a ɛrekɔ so no ho.

promotions.title: Tɔ Ketewa
promotions.desc: Gye nkaebɔ fa tɔ ketewa ne nneɛma foforɔ a ɛyɛ anigye ho.

deleteModal.title: Wopɛ sɛ wopopa akawnt no?
deleteModal.message: Sɛ woyɛ yei a, worentumi nsan anya bio. Wowɔ adwen pa sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa w'akawnt ne wo nsɛm nyinaa?

disputeModal.title: Kasa tia
disputeModal.message: Worekasa atia order #{{orderId}}. Yɛsrɛ wo, kyerɛkyerɛ asɛm no mu.
disputeModal.reasonPlaceholder: mf. Nnoɔma no asɛe, wɔde nnoɔma foforɔ brɛɛ me, mannnya...

cancelModal.title: Wopɛ sɛ wotwitwa order no?
cancelModal.message: Wopɛ sɛ wotwitwa order yi mu ampa? Worentumi nsan nyɛ bio.

banner.title: Te Nsɛm Foforɔ!
banner.body: Ma kwan ma yɛmfa nkaebɔ mmena wo na te nsɛm foforɔ fa wo nnoɔma ho.
banner.enabledBody: W'ahyɛ da ayɛ krado sɛ wobɛte nsɛm foforɔ.

promo.title: Akɛseɛ!
promo.body: Nya 15% tɔɔ fa wo {{service}} a edi hɔ no so. Fa koodu: SWIFT15

paymentSuccess.title: Sika Tua Ayɛ Yie
paymentSuccess.body: Yɛagye wo sika a wotuaeɛ no. Yɛreyɛ wo nnoɔma no ho adwuma seesei ara.

ratingReminder.title: Ma yɛn nim wo adwene!
ratingReminder.body: Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛte wo adwene fa wo nnoɔma a yɛde brɛɛ wo nkyɛeɛ no ho.
